title: I Think Reviews Are Weird
description:
Go to https://ground.news/whimsu to access data driven information from around the world. Subscribe through my link for as little as $1/month or get 40% off unlimited access this month only. 

Wow (Marvel Disney Movie) got a (insert metacritic score here)! I bet that means its (of undefined quality)!

I've always found reviews to be a bit odd. The idea of a 10/10 on IGN denoting something as an instant masterpiece doesn't really jive with me any more.

Recently some games have gotten reviews that I personally disagree with, but that doesn't mean they're "wrong", and today I wanted to talk about that.
